To be prepared is half the victory.
We become what we believe.
A moving door hinge never corrodes. Flowing water never grows stagnant.
Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive.
Where you are right now doesn't have to determine where you'll end up.
I cannot make my days longer so I strive to make them better.
The day is for honest men, the night for thieves.
Never settle for the crumbs of life.
Every blessing ignored becomes a curse.
The best way out is always through.
You can do two things at once, but you can't focus effectively on two things at once.
When at last you are come to the ocean of happiness, do not go back thirsty.
The least deviation from truth will be multiplied later.
Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.
If they wrote it to make money, don't read it.
The Art of Peace begins with you.
Never give way to laziness.
All wealth is the product of labor.
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
You are not the drop in the ocean, but the ocean in the drop.

Where focus goes, energy flows.
Things do not have meaning. We assign meaning to everything.
The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.
The heart wants what it wants - or else it does not care.
It is ignorance that causes most mistakes.
True prayer has no set form.
They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.
Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
Over time, loneliness gets inside you and doesn't go away.
Nothing external to you has any power over you.
Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
The birth of the mind is the death of the senses.

If I can pay the bills, I'm happy.
